title: My post can be removed about the disconnects, but still no server status update?

replies.body:
If your board post was deleted by one of our moderators, you should receive a message in your inbox that goes over why it was done. 

If you have any questions about this, be sure to double check your inbox for an explanation.
Can i ask you an OT question? You new to the Help and Support team since i noticed your name coming up a lot lately and I usually see either Targons Blade or Porocles answering

I've been spotted! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

Yip yip! This poro bro is a bit new to the scene. Thanks for noticing me senpai!
Welcome to the team :D, Targons Blade and Porocles can use all the help thry can get. My head canon is that you are Porocles' long lost brother

Oh gosh we have lore about us already {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

Head canon accepted, I can't wait to hear more xD!

So, what happens when either of you gets 10 x {{item:2052}}?
 :3
Oh man, we have to fight the urge for poro snax enough as is. Don't tempt us even more xD
